General.Name: Hyrican Informationssysteme Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: Hyrican Informationssysteme Aktiengesellschaft offers IT systems services in Germany. The company provides PCs, notebooks, servers, workstations, and peripherals. It also offers IT solutions, including mobility technologies, cloud computing, and data center solutions; and client management, server and storage, IT security, networking, software, and communication solutions, as well as managed, professional, and training services. In addition, the company provides LED lighting solutions, such as LED hall downlight, street light, tubes, ceiling and wall panels, flood and tunnel lights, downlights and spots, and light line systems. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Kindelbrück, Germany.

1.Name: Mr. Sven  Lüttig
1.Title: Chief Officer of Controlling, Chief Officer of HR & Member of Management Board
